name: Mimic Dash
description:
Run for your little life, you cute little slime! Papa mimic is angry and on the chase, how long can you last before you are eaten?

Watch for doors that give clues that they are mimics. Some blink, move their arms, or lick their lips. Try to open a mimic door and it will eat you, so be careful!

Controls:
Click on a door to move and open it.
If you pick a mimic, you'll be eaten!
Pick correctly and you advance to the next wall.

Rinse and repeat while being chased!

All content (art, music, code, etc...) was hand crafted for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 using Unity 2020.3.28, GIMP, and Audacity. Hope you enjoy!
